message.content:
<<<api>>>: InputStream.read
<<<code>>>: 
URL url = new URL("http://50.7.98.106:8398");
URLConnection conn = url.openConnection();
InputStream is = conn.getInputStream();
BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(is));
String line;
while ((line = reader.readLine()) != null) {
    if (line.contains("File1")) {
        String streamUrl = line.split("=")[1];
        Player player = Manager.createPlayer(new URL(streamUrl));
        player.start();
        break;
    }
}
<<<explanation>>>: The InputStream.read API is used to read the .pls file from the URL. The BufferedReader then reads the InputStream line by line. If a line contains "File1", it means that this line contains the URL for the radio stream. This URL is then extracted and used to create a Player object. The radio stream is started with player.start().
